title: Notable & Quotable: Douglas MacArthur on Duty, Honor, Country
sub_head: ‘When I think of his patience under adversity, of his courage under fire, and of his modesty in victory, I am filled with an emotion of admiration I cannot put into words.’
body: From remarks by Gen. Douglas MacArthur to West Point cadets at the United States Military Academy on May 12, 1962:
